lines:
As my account on hand 
is not enough to meet 
this amount, I hope you 
will kindly help me to 
get through within plan 
succesfully, and my 
father will certainly return 
the same that you may 
Advance me in the near 
Future. For your kindness 
and help my thankfuler 
will ever remane.

dam 
yours. Most gratefuly 
s. 6. Luk.
raw: As my account on hand  is not enough to meet  this amount, I hope you  will kindly help me to  get through within plan  succesfully, and my  father will certainly return  the same that you may  Advance me in the near  Future. For your kindness  and help my thankfuler  will ever remane.  dam  yours. Most gratefuly  s. 6. Luk.

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter with Luk's estimate of expenses for his trip to Indiana: $200. He asks Stearns to assist with these expenses, assuring him that Luk's father will cover same.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
